subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are accepting your refinance appication
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
$453,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this one-minute form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://typinfanny.com/
